main event: Three metallic, elliptical objects were observed traveling an undulating course near Ogallala, Nebraska on March 15, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on a clear day with a blue sky and the objects were visible for 15-20 minutes., The objects were estimated to be at altitudes of 10,000-12,000 feet., The observers noted that there was no noise emitted by the objects during their flight., The objects disappeared to the west after being sighted., There were previous reports of unusual lights in the sky near the same location, showing a pattern of sightings.
